Class Movement

  • java.lang.Object
    • Movement

  • public class Movement
extends java.lang.Object
    This class builds the movement animation for each object that moves.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Animation walk_down
      The Animation representing walking down
      Animation walk_left
      The Animation representing walking left
      Animation walk_right
      The Animation representing walking right
      Animation walk_up
      The Animation representing walking up

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Movement(java.lang.String source, int delay)
      This class takes an Image that contains all the movement of the object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Animation getWalkAnimation(Game.Direction dir)
      Return the Correct animation object depending on the direction of the Character

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Movement

        public Movement(java.lang.String source,
        int delay)
        This class takes an Image that contains all the movement of the object. Each direction is a row in the source Image sorted from up->Down->Left->Right

    • Method Detail

      • getWalkAnimation

        public Animation getWalkAnimation(Game.Direction dir)
        Return the Correct animation object depending on the direction of the Character
